AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

params._inputBox: The input box used by the portal

depositEther(address,bytes).details: All the value sent through this function is forwarded to the application.      If the transfer fails, `EtherTransferFailed` error is raised.

params._execLayerData: Additional data to be interpreted by the execution layer

depositEther(address,bytes).notice: Transfer Ether to an application and add an input to the application's input box to signal such operation. All the value sent through this function is forwarded to the application.

getInputBox().notice: Get the input box used by this input relay.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows anyone to perform transfers of Ether to an application while informing the off-chain machine.
